alert.note: Alert for East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:43PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 830 PM MST... At 743 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sun Lakes. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Localized blowing dust below one mile. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, San Tan Village Mall, Seville, Freestone Park, Bapchule, Fiesta Mall, Olberg, Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport, San Tan Mountain Park, Chandler Heights, Gilbert City Hall, Tumbleweed Park, Chandler City Hall and Chandler Fashion Center Mall. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 158 and 183. US Highway 60 between mile markers 177 and 184. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 148 and 172. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
